mapper.insert: insert into CAPA_Board (boardnum, boardname, boardtype, boardjob) values (CAPA_Board_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{boardname}, #{boardtype}, #{boardjob})
mapper.select: select postnum , memberid , title , content , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') inputdate , hits , originalfile , savedfile from CAPA_Post where postnum = #{postnum}
mapper.update: update CAPA_Post set hits = hits + 0.5 where postnum = #{postnum}
